Package model

Class FCarsRentalSystem

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
model.FCarsRentalSystem
public class FCarsRentalSystem
extends javafx.application.Application
The main application class for the rental system. The app is started from this class during runtime. All data from the database is loaded into this class at initial runtime of the application and all controllers can access the data needed for them using the methods in this class. This class also provides methods to edit data of the cars, customers and rentals collected from the DB.
Since:
2020-10-15
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hani Jafer
